Filter Filter Test all actions Test %1$d actions Test action New Test Run %1$d/%2$d actions complete Please fill out the remaining variables to create the test run. Don’t have the values for these variables right now? Skip Next > Finish Create Test Run Testing %1$s Testing %1$d Actions %1$s-actionsX%2$d %1$s-action-%2$s Test Run Name How often? Once Hourly Daily Weekly Start Now Later Choose date and time Now Start Run Schedule Please enter a name Please choose a start date and time Please choose a time in the future The chosen time is within 1 minutes, starting now Starting test run… Test run saved. It will run at the appropriate time. No run id, canceling. Tests running %1$d of %2$d complete All tests complete Future Past All Test Run Frequency Next run Ran at Actions included Delete Run Delete this test run? This will cancel all future scheduled runs. Cancel Delete Test run deleted No relevant scheduled run found. Try running an action(s) to schedule new runs Looks like this run did not complete successfully, it did not run every included action. Status Action Action ID Time UUID Result Category Environment Operator Normal Mode Debug Mode No SIM mode Filter Actions Show %1$d Actions\ Filter Transactions Show %1$d Transactions Reset Search Action ID or name Tags Choose Tags Select tags Only actions with no tags From to From %1$s to %2$s Status Succeeded Pending Failed No transactions %1$d succeeded %1$d pending %1$d failed %1$d total uuid, action name, or action ID Date range Countries Select countries Networks Select network operators Status No transaction Categories Select categories Only show actions with parsers Only show actions with SIM present Something went wrong, please try again Hover_background image_transition image_transition2 action_trans_icon Cannot set custom font At least one default font must be set Email e.g. email@ilovehover.com e.g. com.hover.internal e.g. 1234567890ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQSTUVXYZ Password Enter your password Sign in Forgot password Loading… Logging in, please wait… Unable to get package name, please check app settings. Unable to sign in, please check your email and password. Signed in successfully This action has one or more empty variables. Please check. Testing mode Normal USSD sessions run in the background Debug Watch USSD sessions as they happen No SIM Seconds delay between sessions When you do not have the correct SIM for the service you want to test SIM cards Status indicator Don’t see the correct SIM? Try removing it and re-inserting it. If that doesn\’t work, contact support. Contact support Refresh Profile Sign out SIM 1 SIM 2 Refresh app data No sim detected App would be refreshed in background This action has a pending transaction. This transaction has no parsers or has failed to match an existing parser. Learn more about pending transactions https://docs.usehover.com/parsing Pending Transaction Failed Transaction This action has a failed transaction. This action has matched a parser with a failed transaction status. Learn more about failed transactions https://docs.usehover.com/parsing This action works. This action has not yet been run on this device. This transaction failed This transaction is pending This transaction worked SIM Operators Longcode Parsers Testing variables We submit these values whenever you test this action. Try removing it and re-inserting it. If that doesn\’t work, contact support.
